attributes.action: Call an election now to save our soldiers' lives in Afghanistan and provide them with the proper kit and put enough forces in place to do the job properly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the news broke that 8 of our soldiers were killed today, Gordon Brown went on TV and said we have spent a billion pounds...How crass is that?? Weasle, stupid, words. How much is a life worth?

How many more have to die because the PM is 'playing' at this?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
